languages.text: "Что ж, шерин. Я не в первый раз слышу такое мнение о себе. Не думаю, что в последний. Но важно не то, какими мы находим друг друга... важно том, сможем ли мы договориться".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, шерин. Я не в первый раз слышу такое мнение о себе. Не думаю, что в последний. Но важно не то, какими мы находим друг друга... важно том, сможем ли мы договориться".

languages.text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"
languages.original_text: "Что ж, шерин. Я не в первый раз слышу такое мнение о себе. Не думаю, что в последний. Но важно не то, какими мы находим друг друга... важно том, сможем ли мы договориться".

traits.locale_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time I'm hearing this about myself. Can't be the last time either. But what matters is not how we see each other... what matters is, can we come to an agreement?"

"Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time I'm hearing this about myself. Can't be the last time either. But what matters is not how we see each other... what matters is, can we come to an agreement?"

"Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

"Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

"Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

languages.text: “嗯，我还能说什么呢，亲爱的？这并不是第一次有人这么说我，我猜应该也不会是最后一次吧。不过，我们怎么看待对方并不重要。重要的是……我们之间能否达成某种协议？”
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我还能说什么呢，亲爱的？这并不是第一次有人这么说我，我猜应该也不会是最后一次吧。不过，我们怎么看待对方并不重要。重要的是……我们之间能否达成某种协议？”

languages.text: «No sé qué decir, shereen. No es la primera vez que me lo dicen. Tampoco será la última, pero da igual lo que pensemos. Lo importante es... ¿podemos llegar a un acuerdo?».
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: «No sé qué decir, shereen. No es la primera vez que me lo dicen. Tampoco será la última, pero da igual lo que pensemos. Lo importante es... ¿podemos llegar a un acuerdo?».

languages.text: 「まぁ、何て言ったらいいかね、シャリーン？そう言われるのは初めてじゃないよ。それにこれが最後でもないだろうね。でも、お互いどう思っているかなんて問題じゃない。重要なのは…合意できるかってことだよ？」
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: 「まぁ、何て言ったらいいかね、シャリーン？そう言われるのは初めてじゃないよ。それにこれが最後でもないだろうね。でも、お互いどう思っているかなんて問題じゃない。重要なのは…合意できるかってことだよ？」

languages.text: "Nun, was soll ich sagen, Shereen? Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass das jemand über mich sagt. Und es wird auch nicht das letzte Mal bleiben. Aber es spielt keine Rolle, was wir voneinander halten – wichtig ist nur ... können wir zu einer Einigung kommen?"
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, was soll ich sagen, Shereen? Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass das jemand über mich sagt. Und es wird auch nicht das letzte Mal bleiben. Aber es spielt keine Rolle, was wir voneinander halten – wichtig ist nur ... können wir zu einer Einigung kommen?"

languages.text: « Ma foi, shereen, qu'est-ce que vous voulez que je vous dise ? Ce n'est pas la première fois qu'on me balance ça à la figure et ce ne sera sans doute pas la dernière. Mais quelle importance, ce qu'on pense l'{mf|un|une} de l'autre ? La seule vraie question, c'est... Arrivera-t-on à trouver un accord ? »
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, shereen, qu'est-ce que vous voulez que je vous dise ? Ce n'est pas la première fois qu'on me balance ça à la figure et ce ne sera sans doute pas la dernière. Mais quelle importance, ce qu'on pense l'{mf|un|une} de l'autre ? La seule vraie question, c'est... Arrivera-t-on à trouver un accord ? »

languages.text: "Ne diyeyim şirinim? İlk defa duymuyorum bunları, son kez olacağını da sanmam. Önemli olan birbirimiz hakkında ne düşündüğümüz değil, anlaşmaya varıp varamayacağımız."
languages.original_text: "Well, what can I say, shereen? This isn't the first time someone's said that about me. Don't think it'll be the last time either. But it doesn't matter what we think of each other — what matters is... can we come to an agreement?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne diyeyim şirinim? İlk defa duymuyorum bunları, son kez duyacağımı da sanmam ama önemli olan birbirimiz hakkında ne düşündüğümüz değil anlaşmaya varıp varamayacağımız."
